response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you, valued at $1,200,000. I am offering this product to you at a special price, reflecting my confidence in its quality and your appreciation for it. My proposal is to sell it to you for $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its true worth, providing you with an exceptional investment or asset at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction with you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
